recipe.title: Horseradish Cream
ingredients: 2 tablespoons grated fresh horseradish or drained prepared horseradish
instructions: Combine sour cream, horseradish, paprika and garlic in small bowl until well blended. Season to taste with salt and pepper. (Can be prepared 8 hours ahead. Cover and keep refrigerated.)
